text: Ursula Steiger is an Austrian para-alpine skier. She represented Austria at the 1976 Winter Paralympics and at the 1980 Winter Paralympics. In total she won one silver medal and three bronze medals in alpine skiing. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=3 | 1976 | rowspan=3 | 1976 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=3 | Örnsköldsvik, Sweden | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Slalom I | 1:48.05 |- | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Women's Giant Slalom I | 1:48.62 |- | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Women's Alpine Combination I | 1:55.48 |- | 1980 | 1980 Winter Paralympics | Geilo, Norway | bgcolor=cc9966 | 3rd | Women's Slalom 1A | 1:35.03 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Austrian female alpine skiers
title: Ursula Steiger
